home.headersubtext: Enter your name and pick an avatar.
home.joinInfo: You have an access code and want to join a room?
home.roomCodeLabel: Enter the access code of the room you want to join.
home.createInfo: Instead create a new room and invite your friends?

room.pickgames: Pick the games you want to play
room.settings: How long should the game last?
room.min-user-info: As soon as you are a group of four you are ready to go

help.explainmindr: Mindr is a mix of several party & casual games you can play online with your friends. You can enable and disable each game mode according to your needs and pick between the standard or drinking mode.
help.whatgameshint: Click on a game mode to see how to play.

gameexplanation.quiz: Trivia questions: which of these photos shows 'x', where is 'y' located on Earth, how much does a 'z' weigh?
gameexplanation.drawguess: One person draws a term while everyone else guesses what it is supposed to represent.
gameexplanation.mostlikely: An activity or characteristic is described and everyone picks the person to whom it fits best.
gameexplanation.bestartist: Everyone paints the same term and then rates the pictures of the other players.
gameexplanation.survey: Everyone chooses his/her favorite from four things in the same super category. The majority wins.
gameexplanation.whoknowsyou: Everyone answers the same question and tries to connect the answers of the others to each person.

error.roomRequired: Enter the room you want to join
